import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { OrderDetailsService } from '../services/order-details.service'; @Component({ selector: 'home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private service : OrderDetailsService) { } foodData: any; ngOnInit(): void { this.foodData = this.service.foodDetails; } }
